Detailed Description

template<typename Reactants, typename Products>
class Mutation::Kinetics::ReactionStoich< Reactants, Products >

Connects reactant and product stoichiometry types together so that Jacobian contributions made by a single reaction can be determined.

Member Function Documentation

◆ contributeToJacobian()

void contributeToJacobian ( const double  kf,
const double  kb,
const double *const  conc,
double *const  work,
double *const  sjac,
const size_t  ns 
) const
virtual

Adds this reaction's contribution to the species Jacobian matrix.

Note that this will affect the rows of each species that particpates in this reaction. The compiler should be able to unroll each loop since the sizes are known at compile time given the Reactants and Products stoichiometry types.

Implements ReactionStoichBase.

Reimplemented in ThirdbodyReactionStoich< Reactants, Products >.

Definition at line 60 of file JacobianManager.cpp.
